body_html:
I think this is a note for the Programmer's Guide. We're working on a redesign of the table of contents for the Programmer's Guide, but I would suggest you create a fresh doc entitled "Non-determinism in TensorFlow". If you submit it as a separate doc in tensorflow/docs_src/programmers_guide, we may glom it into another document when we reorganize. Thanks for writing it up!
…

body:
I think this is a note for the Programmer's Guide.  We're working on a
redesign of the table of contents for the Programmer's Guide, but I would
suggest you create a fresh doc entitled "Non-determinism in TensorFlow".
If you submit it as a separate doc in
tensorflow/docs_src/programmers_guide, we may glom it into another document
when we reorganize.

Thanks for writing it up!

On Wed, Jun 7, 2017 at 9:06 PM, Samuel Chin <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> @benjrossi <https://github.com/benjrossi> nice post. I'm working on a
> short guide and hope to push a first draft within the next 2 weeks.
